ABOUTSUS.desc: Hi Everyone, I am Wala Kharouf from Tunisia, Gabes.
ABOUTSUS.desc1: I am a final year student pursuing an Integrated MSc (IMSc) in Maths and Computing at BIT Mesra. Additionally, I am currently employed as a software developer at Juspay.
